Package com.yourcompany.app

Class ClientObj

java.lang.Object
com.yourcompany.app.Player
com.yourcompany.app.ClientObj
public class ClientObj extends Player
Communicator between server, user, and game (Inherits Player) saves player data here are some methods to interact with the user
